funding-group.funding-statement: A.D.B. was supported by a National Science Foundation Graduate Research Fellowship and the Center for Health and Wellbeing at Princeton University. A.W. was supported by a career award at the Scientific Interface from the Burroughs Wellcome Fund and the National Institutes of Health Directorâ€™s New Innovator Award (DP2LM013102). O.N.B. was supported by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation and the National Science Foundation. B.T.G. was supported by the Research and Policy for Infectious Disease Dynamics program of the Science and Technology Directorate, Department of Homeland Security, the Fogarty International Center, National Institutes of Health, the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation, and the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
